description: Prep node for host side non-sequence-based assays.

SampleName.description: A short label that is referable to the sample used to generate the dataset.

ShortLabel.description: Nomenclature used to group/organize experiments in a meaningful way, e.g. Control Exp II.

center.description: The center responsible for generating the host assay Prep.

contact.description: Name and email of the primary contact at the center.

storage_duration.title: MIGS/MIMS storage_duration in days.
storage_duration.description: Duration for which sample was stored in days.

experiment_type.title: Experiment type, as defined by PRIDE.
enum: PRIDE:0000430, Chemical cross-linking coupled with mass spectrometry proteomics
PRIDE:0000433, Affinity purification coupled with mass spectrometry proteomics

species.title: Controlled vocabulary term to describe a single species. NEWT CV terms are allowed

cell_type.title: Controlled vocabulary term to describe a single cell type. Cell type ontology CV terms are allowed.

tissue.title: Controlled vocabulary term to describe a single tissue. BRENDA Tissue CV terms are allowed.

reference.description: Links to any literature citations for which this experiment provides supporting evidence, required once available.

ProtocolName.description: Protocol title with versioning, ideally pointing to a url.

ProtocolSteps.description: Description of the sample processing steps that have been performed, using PRIDE cv eg <cvParam cvLabel="PRIDE" accession="PRIDE:0000026" name="Alkylation" value="iodoacetamide" />.

ExpDescription.description: Description of the goals and objectives of this study, summary of the abstract, optimally 2-3 sentences.

sampleDescription.description: Expansible description of the sample used to generate the dataset, recommended ontologies NEWT and BTO, eg <cvParam cvLabel="NEWT" accession="10090" name="Mus musculus (Mouse)" />.

study.description: One of the 3 studies that are part of the iHMP.

subtype.description: The subtype of the Assay Prep.

tags.description: An array of descriptive strings to make the node 'taggable'.
